TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入資料列時，就會發生事件控制項。The event occurs when rows are added to a control. 當使用者將使用新的記錄，資料列的新資料列值的處理常式中這個事件是等於新的記錄的資料列的新位置的索引是其中一種大於剛才加入的資料列。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 當您將加入資料列以程式設計的方式，不過，值是加入第一個資料列的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value is the index of the first row added. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件，以遞增的虛擬機器中的資料列數目。The following code example handles the event to increment the number of rows in a virtual . 用於資料列數目處理常式，讓它知道時顯示空白資料格與初始化的新資料列儲存格。The number of rows is used in the handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#20)]

The number of rows that have been added.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#357)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#357)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer

summary.span: 取得第一個加入的資料列之索引。

value.span: 第一個加入的資料列之索引。

span.span: The index of the first added row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者將使用新資料錄的資料列的新資料列時，這個屬性的值等於新的記錄的資料列的新位置的索引是其中一種大於剛才加入的資料列。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value of this property is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 當您以程式設計方式加入資料列時，不過，這個屬性的值會是加入第一個資料列的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value of this property is the index of the first row added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#357)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#357](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#357)]
